name: Small Talk Simulator
description:
Ever wish you could relive those fleeting encounters with a stranger? Ever want to experience what small talk would be like if you were more aggressive? Well now you can! Small Talk Simulator allows you to feel the highs and lows of those awkward social encounters without leaving your bedroom! Incredible! Features:

•Visceral clicking action

•Compelling soundtrack of stock music

•Randomly generated elements for increased replay value

•14 unique endings!

Note: The download isn't any different from the web version, but it's here if you want it.
